name: Hm News Ticker
author: hmmurad

sections.description:
Hm News Ticker is a nice & awesome news ticker with controls. You can easily install and customize it by yourself. Here is nice controls for your news post or blog post headlines. The plugin is very much light weight. It has linking system so that reader can easily go there desire post.

Wanna see demo , Please click here.

Arbitrary section

You may provide arbitrary sections, in the same format as the ones above. This may be of use for extremely complicated
plugins where more information needs to be conveyed that doesn’t fit into the categories of “description” or
“installation.” Arbitrary sections will be shown below the built-in sections outlined above.

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. Some feature
  2. Another feature
  3. Something else about the plugin

Unordered list:

  • something
  • something else
  • third thing

Here’s a link to WordPress and one to Markdown’s Syntax Documentation.
Titles are optional, naturally.

Markdown uses email style notation for blockquotes and I’ve been told:

Asterisks for emphasis. Double it up for strong.

<?php code(); // goes in backticks ?>
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_shortcode('[YOUR SHORTCODE]'); ?> in your templates

Hm News Ticker is a nice & awesome news ticker with controls. You can easily instal and customize it by yourself.
See below for the custom options:

General Ticker

[ticker_list id="1"]

Category

[ticker_list id="2" category="category_slug"]

Speed

 [ticker_list id="3" speed=".03"]

Title

[ticker_list id="4" title="Breaking"]

Color

[ticker_list id="5" color="#F075C9"]

Background

[ticker_list id="6" bg="#2B3039"]

Quantity

[ticker_list id="7" quantity="1"]

For controls

[ticker_list id="8" control="false"]

Note: If you want to change your different parameters , you must change your id .

short_description: Here is a short description of the plugin.  This should be no more than 150 characters.  No markup here.
